scripts.unit-tests: npm run clean-unit-tests && npm run build-unit-tests && npm run run-unit-tests
scripts.integration-tests-ci: npm run clean-integration-tests && npm run build-integration-tests && npm run run-integration-tests-ci
scripts.integration-tests: npm run clean-integration-tests && npm run build-integration-tests && npm run run-integration-tests
scripts.clean-tests: npm run clean-unit-tests && npm run clean-integration-tests
scripts.build-tests: npm run build-unit-tests && npm run build-integration-tests
scripts.run-tests: npm run run-unit-tests && npm run run-integration-tests
scripts.run-tests-ci: npm run run-unit-tests && npm run run-integration-tests-ci
scripts.tests: npm run clean-tests && npm run build-tests && npm run run-tests
scripts.tests-ci: npm run clean-tests && npm run build-tests && npm run run-tests-ci
scripts.clean: npm run clean-unit-tests && npm run clean-integration-tests && npm run clean-ts && npm run clean-ts-dist && npm run clean-examples
scripts.check: npm rum lint-errors-only && npm run build-ts && npm run tests && echo Done!
